sentences.en: For nearly two hours, I waited my turn at the barbershop.
sentences.cn: 我在理发店(排队)等了差不多两个小时.
他加入了理发店四重唱.

sentences.en: I have run into him in the barbershop there.
sentences.cn: 我在理发馆那儿遇到了他.

sentences.en: I must go to the barbershop.
Is there a barbershop near here?
IS THERE A BEAUTY SALON ( BARBERSHOP )
sentences.cn: 这里有美容院(理发店吗 )

sentences.en: Is there a beauty salon ( barbershop ) in this hotel?
sentences.cn: 旅馆中有美容院 ( 理发厅 ) 么 ?

sentences.en: Isn't he the kid from the barbershop?
sentences.cn: 这不是从理发店里来的那小子 吗 ?

sentences.en: Mr. Cremona's barbershop was an oasis of beauty and good will.
sentences.cn: 老克的理发店恍如一块美丽亲善的绿洲.

sentences.en: Mr. Sun goes to the barbershop to have a haircut.
sentences.cn: 孙先生到理发店去理发.

sentences.en: Visit a barbershop and pay for using their services.
sentences.cn: 拜访一座理发店并理发.
这家理发店什么时候结束营业?

sentences.en: You go to a new barbershop or something?
sentences.cn: 您去一间新理发店或某事?

sentences.en: You'd better go to the barbershop now.
sentences.cn: 你最好现在就去理发店.

trans.tran_en: a style of singing popular songs with parts for four men, usually without music
